ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( ( RecordType.Name = "Inquiry"), ( ISPICKVAL( os_Agency_Inquiry_Type__c , "Agents")), ( ISBLANK( os_Agent_Full_Name__c )), ( ISBLANK( os_Agent_Mobile__c )), ( ISBLANK( os_Agent_Email__c )) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill up the details Agent Full Name, Mobile and Email
